channel.title: (317 DELTA) Any ideas? Rep++ for answer(s)!
channel.description:
[center]Okay so right now players can follow eachother through walls, and npc's follow the player through walls as well.
[u]I believe this is called PlayerClipping and NPCclipping.[/u]
[b]I can not find any tutorials on how to add this to my server. (317 DELTA)[/b]
If anyone can provide me with help, i'll rep++.
Thanks![/center]

item.title: (317 DELTA) Any ideas? Rep++ for answer(s)!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

lostmyphat:

Theres one called dorphets or something for npc clipping, try google

Googled it. It came up with 2 results.

Both are NPC Farcasting.

Read full topic
